changeSet.author: JunjieLi
changeSet.comment: Add tool_calls, llm_calls, and reports columns to tasks table for real-time statistics tracking
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE tasks ADD COLUMN tool_calls INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN llm_calls INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, ADD COLUMN reports INT NOT NULL DEFAULT 0;
changeSet.rollback: ALTER TABLE tasks DROP COLUMN tool_calls, DROP COLUMN llm_calls, DROP COLUMN reports;
